Todo List

Global __DEF_IINCHIP_BUF_OP__
__DEF_MCU_DEP_XXX__
If you define __DEF_MCU_DEP_XXX, You should do implement the code to access internal TX/RX memory of W5300.
Because the code is dependant on your MCU & compiler.

Global __DEF_IINCHIP_MAP_BASE__
__DEF_IINCHIP_MAP_BASE__ should be defined as your specified physical address value instead of '0x0800000'.

Global IINCHIP_CRITICAL_SECTION_ENTER
You should do implement that is suitable in your MCU & compiler.

Global IINCHIP_CRITICAL_SECTION_EXIT
You should do implement that is suitable in your MCU & compiler.

Global iinchip_irq
You should do implement your interrupt request routine instead of this function. If you want to use ISR, this function should be mapped in your ISR handler.

Global wait_10ms
These delay functions depend on the MCU. Therefore, These function should be replaced with yours.
